column1: Smoque BBQ////There are only a few restaurants where patrons walk in with a smile on their face
column2: order their food with a smile on their face
column3: eat huge tender chunks of meat with a smile on their face
column4: and leave with a smile on their face. Smoque does that. When people talk about Chicago
column5: lots of people mention the hot dogs or the deep dish
column6: but they should really be talking about the BBQ.
